ecogardens_odessa: There's nothing better than waking up in a clear, frosty morning under the clatter of wheels. Get up, walk along the sleeping berths, swaying measuredly to the tune of the train. In moments like this, when you're on your own, thoughts fill your mind especially. Looking at instantly changing landscapes outside the window you want to believe only in the best. The train knocks. Life races just as fast, because it is also like traveling on a train, and you want to believe that at the end of the journey you will go to the best time. A time where we'll always be a little kids. A time where the smell of the train's ovens excites the mind and heart. The train swaying measured. Life goes on. P.S. You make the world a better place)) I would like to participate, too))🤗😉🇺🇦
